data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a Lovecraft sentence by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific sentence from H.P. Lovecraft's works by its unique identifier. Requires the sentence ID as a path parameter. Returns a sentence object containing the text, source book, and metadata. Returns 404 if the sentence ID does not exist.
data.reasoning: Summary lacks specificity about the lookup mechanism (by ID). Description is missing entirely, so AI agents cannot understand the required input parameter or expected response.
